titles.title: O God, Our Help in Ages Past (Isaac Watts)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O God, our Help in ages past, Our Hope for years to come, Our Shelter from the stormy blast, And our Eternal Home!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Before the hills in order stood, Or earth received her frame, From everlasting Thou art God, To endless years the same.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O God, our Help in ages past, Our Hope for years to come, Be Thou my Guide while life shall last, And our Eternal Home.{/lang-eng}
